title: Portable File and Folder Managers DC 2016.07.31
description:
** About this release

This collection includes the latest versions of the best File and Folder Managers for Windows.

All applications were virtualized using the latest version of VMWare Thinapp, which ensures they run on any Windows version (tested on Windows 10 64-bit).
VMWare ThinApp USB versions do not write files nor registry entries to the host computer.
Instead, they deploy all necessary data to a subfolder along the executable.

Automatic updates and internet connections were disabled whenever such options are made available in the program's option (block any internet connection attempt with your firewall).

Applications are registered and/or patched, you will be able to run them from any location (folder, USB drive).
Some applications are system specific (32-bit/64-bit), others will run on both systems.

All files were scanned with ESET Smart Security (updated 2016.07.31)

Usage: unpack to a directory of your choice and launch your favourite application.
Size (unpacked): 879 MB

** Included in this release

Altap Salamander 3.0.6 (powerful two panel file manager)
Beyond Compare 4.1.6 Build 21095 (directory compare and file compare - Scooter Software)
Detwinner 2.03.003 (duplicate file finder - Neat Decisions)
Directory List and Print Pro 3.18 (directory listing and printing - Infonautics)
Directory Lister Enterprise 1.71 (directory printer, find duplicate files, show folder size - Krksoft)
Directory Monitor Pro 2.10.6.1 (real-time monitoring of file changes, modifications, deletions, new files and file access)
DtSearch Desktop Engine 7.84.8392 (instant searching of desktop-accessible files - includes required Microsoft Visual C++ 2015)
Duplicate File Detective 6.0.76 Professional (finding and remove duplicate files)
EF Commander 11.50 (multi-featured file manager - EFSoftware)
ExamDiff Pro 8.0.1.8 (visual file and directory comparison tool - Prestosoft)
File Date Corrector 1.12 (enables to correct easily and quickly the "Date Created" and "Date Modified" - Infonautics)
FileSeek Pro 5.0.1 (file search app that includes advanced functionality - Binary Fortress Software)
IDM UltraCompare Professional 16.00.36 (track differences between files, directories, and .zip archives - IDM Computer Solutions)
Rename Expert 5.10.1 (quickly and easily rename files and folders - Gillmeister)
SyncBackPro 7.6.18.0 (backup, synchronize, and restore data files - 2BrightSparks )
Syncovery Pro Enterprise 7.5.7 Build 385 (back up data and synchronize PCs, servers, and notebooks - Super Flexible Software)
